entry.title: Amid Mainstream Boom, AI Skeptics Say the Tech is Over Hyped
entry.summary: More than half of survey respondents said AI is "over-hyped," even as it's clearly impacted software development.

entry.title: Sam Altman's Ouster Followed Dangerous AI Breakthrough Claim: Reuters
entry.summary: Unnamed sources say Altman's brief departure from OpenAI was sparked by a new AI discovery that some felt threatened humanity.

entry.title: Indian AI Video Startup Rephrase.ai Announces Acquisition by Adobe
entry.summary: Aimed somewhere between Photoshop and Premiere Pro, the tool lets users create videos from scratch with just a prompt.

entry.title: Stability AI Audio Head Quits Over Training on Copyrighted Material. Will It Change Anything?
entry.summary: Ed Newton-Rex shares further insights into the AI industry's approach to copyright following his very public resignation.

entry.title: Stable Video Diffusion Is Stability AI's Gambit for the Future of Video
entry.summary: Put text in, get vibrant video content out—Stability AI joins the fray with Meta, Runway and Pika Labs.

entry.title: AI Needs ‘Rules of the Road’: Apple CEO Tim Cook
entry.summary: Apple's Tim Cook spoke with Dua Lipa about AI's potential and the necessity for regulatory frameworks.

entry.title: Cruise CEO Steps Down Amid Self-Driving Car Safety Crisis
entry.summary: Kyle Vogt said he was optimistic about his business, but regulatory actions may have made moving forward untenable.

entry.title: Anthropic Upgrades Claude With Nearly Twice The Capabilities of GPT-4 Turbo
entry.summary: While the drama at OpenAI captures most of the attention, OpenAI challenger Anthropic delivers the latest version of its capable chatbot.

entry.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!
In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme.
They discuss - How to sell feet pics - If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems - the intersections between crypto and sex work

entry.title: Drug Giant AstraZeneca Launches Evinova to Quicken Clinical Trials
entry.summary: Evinova aims to use AI to design studies, automate cost calculations, and determine feasibility for drug testing.

entry.title: As ‘Decels’ Rise, Meta Dissolves Its Responsible AI Team
entry.summary: As calls to slow development of artificial intelligence to ensure safety grow louder, Meta is broadening its efforts.

entry.title: How Sam Altman Was Pushed From OpenAI Into Microsoft's Open Arms
entry.summary: A tumultuous weekend for the AI giant saw its co-founders depart for Microsoft amid a boardroom battle. Here’s how it happened.

entry.title: SingularityNET Joins With Dfinity Foundation for AI Models That Run on Smart Contracts
entry.summary: Dfinity founder Dominic Williams says the collaboration aims to provide trustworthy, decentralized, and tamper-proof large language models.

entry.title: How Ubisoft, Xbox, and Blizzard Are Using AI to Make Next-Generation Games
entry.summary: Game studios are turning to AI to automate the most tedious elements of development and instantly conjure characters.

entry.title: Sam Altman May Return to Lead OpenAI: Reports
entry.summary: The battle is being framed as one between "decels" and Effective Altruists who want to slow down, and Altman allies who want to move faster.

entry.title: UK Won’t Regulate AI Anytime Soon As It Tries to Balance Innovation and Safety
entry.summary: While U.S. policymakers scramble to put guardrails around AI, a British minister eschews “premature regulation” by politicians.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis
entry.summary:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Clyde's Last Call: Discord AI Chatbot Shutting Down on December 1
entry.summary: Without giving a reason, the popular chat platform says its Clyde AI beta will be deactivated next month.

entry.title: Sam Altman Out as CEO of OpenAI, Was 'Not Consistently Candid' With Company Board
entry.summary: ”The board no longer has confidence in his ability to continue leading OpenAI,” a company statement read.

entry.title: Digital Despair: AI Girlfriends Ghost Users After CEO's Arrest Ignites Chaos
entry.summary: The CEO of an AI-powered romantic chatbot service turned up the heat—allegedly, and literally.

entry.title: AI Is Making People ‘Question Their Own Reality’: Chelsea Manning
entry.summary: Manning highlighted the clash between humans and technology at Lisbon's Web Summit, questioning AI's rapid development.

entry.title: Emu Video and Emu Edit: Meta Debuts AI Models for Video and Images
entry.summary: The social giant’s latest tools can conjure stunning visuals from text, setting up a generative AI showdown.

entry.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.

entry.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash
entry.summary: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.

entry.title: Former VP Leaves Stability AI Over Copyright Concerns
entry.summary: Ed Newton-Rex resigned from Stability AI, contesting the company's assertion that using copyrighted content in AI training is "fair use."

entry.title: Meet Maia and Cobalt, Microsoft's New Custom Chips Designed for AI Supremacy
entry.summary: Microsoft is shifting to an integrated strategy to grow both its AI and cloud computing portfolio.

entry.title: ChatGPT Puts Paid Plan Signups on Pause as Systems Strain
entry.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said usage of its services has "exceeded our capacity."

entry.title: New Open Source AI Model from China Boasts Twice the Capacity of ChatGPT
entry.summary: The Yi series model takes a giant leap over its American competitors, at least by some metrics.

entry.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action.
Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'
entry.summary: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: Mind-Reading AI Turns Thoughts Into Text, Gives ALS Patient His Voice Back
entry.summary: Using brainwave sensors and AI, Unbabel’s new Project Halo hears messages and generates silent replies. Just think about it and the machine does all the work.

entry.title: GPT-5 Is Officially on the OpenAI Roadmap Despite Prior Hesitation
entry.summary: After initial reluctance, new remarks show OpenAI is already laying the groundwork for GPT-5 mere days after turbocharging GPT-4.

entry.title: Square Enix-Backed Atlas Uses AI to Turn Text and Images Into Game Worlds
entry.summary: The generative AI startup Atlas emerges from stealth with $6 million in gaming and blockchain investments.

entry.title: Nvidia Created an AI to Better Understand COVID-19 and Accelerate Medical Discoveries
entry.summary: The new GenSLMs model can generate realistic and predictive SARS-CoV-2 genetic variants.

entry.title: Google Puts Scammers On Blast for Exploiting AI Hype
entry.summary: A lawsuit in California court aims to end malicious ads and malware distribution on Facebook.

entry.title: New Nvidia Supercomputing Chips to ‘Fuel the Acceleration’ of AI
entry.summary: At its Supercomputing 2023 event, Nvidia unveiled upgraded chips and a supercomputer that can accelerate scientific research.

entry.title: From Offended Bots to Occult Gurus, The 7 Best Custom GPTs People Have Created—So Far
entry.summary: OpenAI just launched custom GPTs, and you can say goodbye to boring assistants.

entry.title: Can’t AI Take a Joke? Elon Musk and Sam Altman Trade Testy Tweets
entry.summary: The tech moguls exchanged AI-themed insults about their rival chatbots, with Altman saying Grok has “cringy boomer humor.”

entry.title: ‘Confidential’: Free ChatGPT Users Briefly Get Access to GPT-4
entry.summary: Could we see a free version of ChatGPT with the powerful GPT-4 under the hood? Only OpenAI knows.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: OpenAI Battles Service Disruption Linked to Russian Hackers
entry.summary: OpenAI links recent ChatGPT outages and its API to a Distributed Denial of Service attack.

entry.title: Meta's Next AI Gambit? Llama 3 Rumored for Early 2024
entry.summary: Meta’s next Llama AI release could challenge the dominance of OpenAI's GPT-4, but Mark Zuckerberg remains mum on the timing of its release.

entry.title: Google and Anthropic Are Gunning for AI Dominance with New Chips
entry.summary: Anthropic's Claude LLM gains a competitive edge with Google's TPU v5e chips, pushing the boundaries of AI's computational frontier.

entry.title: Humane Launches Wearable AI Pin With a $700 Price Tag
entry.summary: The small device integrates AI into daily life for a price, but privacy concerns loom.

entry.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: AI Arrives on YouTube With Comment Summaries and Video Suggestions
entry.summary: YouTube’s AI tool aims to turn comment chaos into organized insights.

entry.title: Killer Combo: ChatGPT Merged With Dall-E, Vision, Web Browsing and Code Interpreter
entry.summary: Here's what you can do now with multimodal capabilities, where it's not just about what you say, but what you show.

entry.title: Mozilla Enlists Fakespot for AI Chatbot to Safeguard Online Shopping
entry.summary: Is AI the solution to fake, AI-generated product reviews?

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid
entry.summary:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.

entry.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token
entry.summary: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.

entry.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
entry.summary:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.
